name: Filetto saltato delizioso
desc: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: filetto saltato
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Stir-Fried Filet.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: Un pezzo di carne fresca. Se trattata in modo appropriato, può diventare un piatto delizioso.

value.name: Peperoncino di Jueyun
value.desc: Un pianta piccante nativa di Liyue. Basta annusarlo per provare caldo e sete.

value.name: Filetto saltato
value.desc: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

value.name: Filetto saltato sospetto
value.desc: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.
